query:
UPDATE backup_batches
        SET jobs_completed = jobs_completed + 1,
            completed_at = CASE
                WHEN jobs_completed + 1 = jobs_enqueued THEN NOW()
                ELSE completed_at
            END
        WHERE id = $1
        RETURNING
            jobs_enqueued,
            jobs_completed,
            next_cursor_created,
            next_cursor_id
